thread.title: IIT Madras Final Year Student Found Hanging In Hostel Room
thread.title_full: IIT Madras Final Year Student Found Hanging In Hostel Room

author: Tehelka Web Desk
title: IIT Madras Final Year Student Found Hanging In Hostel Room
text:
IIT Madras 
Barely a month after a student of IIT - Madras was found hanging, a student of the same institute today found hanging in his hostel room this morning. 
According to reports, the student was in his fourth year of electrical engineering and has been identified as Rahul G. Prasad who was residing in the third floor of Ganga hostel. He is from Kollam in Kerala. 
The incident happened after another student of the same institution, Nagendra Reddy, was found in the same condition in his hostel room. Police suspected that he was depressed after he failed to ace an exam. 
IIT Madras director, in a statement, has expressed regret over the incident. “At this time, we have no indication of the reason for death,” he said. 
The cause of the suicide of the student from Kerala is yet to be ascertained and no suicide note has been found, police said. */
